text: A Crime (Swedish: Ett brott) is a 1940 Swedish crime drama movie directed by Anders Henrikson (who also stars) and was based on the 1933 play of the same name by Sigfrid Siwertz. Also starring Edvin Adolphson, Karin Ekelund, Carl Barcklind, Gösta Cederlund, Håkan Westergren, Sigurd Wallén, Dagmar Ebbesen, Einar Axelsson, Åke Claesson. ==Other websites== * Category:1940 crime drama movies Category:Swedish crime movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Movies set in Sweden Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Anders Henrikson
title: A Crime (1940 movie)
